actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to require that the United States Government prepare and make public annual consolidated financial statements utilizing the accrual method of accounting, and for other purposes.
short_title: Truth in Government Accounting Act of 1979

summary.text: Truth in Government Accounting Act of 1979 - Requires the Secretary of the Treasury to prepare and make public annual consolidated financial statements for all expenditures of the United States utilizing the accrual method of accounting.

titles.title: Truth in Government Accounting Act of 1979
A bill to require that the United States Government prepare and make public annual consolidated financial statements utilizing the accrual method of accounting, and for other purposes.
